reRouteEveryTicks.description: Check for a new route every x times after the car starts

maxSpeedAndLengthFactor.description: How much the length/speed influences the routing

freshnessCutOffValue.description: If data is older than this, it is not considered in the algorithm

freshnessUpdateFactor.description: How much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing

totalCarCounter.description: The total amount of cars that should be in the system

explorationPercentage.description: The percentage of routes we want to use for exploration

routeRandomSigma.description: The randomization sigma of edge weights

averageEdgeDurationFactor.description: How much the averageEdgeDurationFactor influences the routing

routingDuration.description: The time it takes for routing
